name: abssubd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

comment: Swapping order of subtraction doesn't change the absolute value. Example of [Apostol] p. 363. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
